name: Cooke's Crating & Fine Arts Transportation
description: Regularly scheduled fine art shuttle service between Los Angeles and San Francisco. Secure, climate-controlled, air-ride transportation with GPS tracking and optional connections to the Pacific Northwest.

itemOffered.name: LA to San Francisco Art Shuttle
itemOffered.description: 9 to 12 scheduled runs yearly using unmarked, climate-controlled, air-ride trucks with cellular and GPS tracking.

itemOffered.name: Pacific Northwest Shuttle Connection
itemOffered.description: specialized art shipping connection serving the Pacific Northwest region.

review.reviewBody: Many thanks to Dave and Keenan for their help. I work with art handlers across the country and was impressed with their knowledge and professionalism in handling my client's art work.

Thank you for sending out Pete and Mark to complete the job at the San Gabriel Mission last week. They did a wonderful job, despite all the obstacles they faced while installing the artwork in the museum.
